smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

smells.name: LargeClass

smells.name: LongMethod
smells.description: One method should have one responsibility. Long methods tend to handle many things at once. Prefer smaller methods to make them easier to understand.

smells.name: LongParameterList
smells.description: The more parameters a method has the more complex it is. Long parameter lists are often used to control complex algorithms and violate the Single Responsibility Principle. Prefer methods with short parameter lists.

smells.name: UnsafeCast
smells.description: Cast operator throws an exception if the cast is not possible.

instances.message: newValue cannot be safely cast to String.
newValue cannot be safely cast to String.
newValue cannot be safely cast to String.
LayoutInflater.from(parent.context).inflate(R.layout.map_source_card, parent, false) cannot be safely cast to CardView.
inflater.inflate(R.layout.fragment_wmts_view, container, false) cannot be safely cast to ConstraintLayout.
activity cannot be safely cast to AppCompatActivity.
dialog cannot be safely cast to AlertDialog.
arguments?.get(ARG_AREA) cannot be safely cast to Area.
ignUser cannot be safely cast to String.
ignPwd cannot be safely cast to String.
ignApiKey cannot be safely cast to String.
args.get(MAP_ID) cannot be safely cast to Int.
args.get(MARKER_ID) cannot be safely cast to MarkerGson.Marker.
activity cannot be safely cast to AppCompatActivity.
activity.getSystemService(Context.INPUT_METHOD_SERVICE) cannot be safely cast to InputMethodManager.
context.getDrawable(R.drawable.avd_landmark_rounded) cannot be safely cast to AnimatedVectorDrawable.
context.getDrawable(R.drawable.vd_landmark_location_rounded) cannot be safely cast to Drawable.
context.getDrawable(R.drawable.avd_landmark_location_rounded) cannot be safely cast to AnimatedVectorDrawable.
context.getDrawable(R.drawable.avd_landmark_rounded_location) cannot be safely cast to AnimatedVectorDrawable.
inflater.inflate(R.layout.fragment_tracks_manage, container, false) cannot be safely cast to FrameLayout.
activity cannot be safely cast to MainActivity?.
view.findViewById<View>(R.id.track_name_edittext) cannot be safely cast to EditText.
view.findViewById<View>(R.id.track_name_edittext) cannot be safely cast to EditText.
context.getDrawable(R.drawable.avd_marker_circle_grab_out) cannot be safely cast to AnimatedVectorDrawable.
context.getDrawable(R.drawable.avd_marker_circle_grab_in) cannot be safely cast to AnimatedVectorDrawable.
binding.root cannot be safely cast to ConstraintLayout.
activity cannot be safely cast to AppCompatActivity.
positionMarker.parent cannot be safely cast to ViewGroup.
it.data cannot be safely cast to PathView.DrawablePath.
it.data cannot be safely cast to PathView.DrawablePath.
url.openConnection() cannot be safely cast to HttpURLConnection.
this.getSystemService(Context.LOCATION_SERVICE) cannot be safely cast to LocationManager.
getSystemService(Context.NOTIFICATION_SERVICE) cannot be safely cast to NotificationManager.
getSystemService(Context.NOTIFICATION_SERVICE) cannot be safely cast to NotificationManager.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (recordings.contains(it)) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: recordings.contains(it)
Parentheses in (levelMin + 1) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: levelMin + 1
Parentheses in (b.toInt() shr 4) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: b.toInt() shr 4
Parentheses in (p + gracePeriodDays) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: p + gracePeriodDays

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.
